code: /* eslint-disable no-param-reassign */import produce from'immer';import{GET_LABELS,GET_MAILS,GET_MAIL,OPEN_SIDEBAR,CLOSE_SIDEBAR,OPEN_NEW_MESSAGE,CLOSE_NEW_MESSAGE}from'src/actions/mailActions';import objFromArray from'src/utils/objFromArray';var initialState={mails:{byId:{},allIds:[]},labels:[],sidebarOpen:false,newMessageOpen:false};var mailReducer=function mailReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_LABELS:{var labels=action.payload.labels;return produce(state,function(draft){draft.labels=labels;});}case GET_MAILS:{var mails=action.payload.mails;return produce(state,function(draft){draft.mails.byId=objFromArray(mails);draft.mails.allIds=Object.keys(draft.mails.byId);});}case GET_MAIL:{var mail=action.payload.mail;return produce(state,function(draft){draft.mails.byId[mail.id]=mail;if(!draft.mails.allIds.includes(mail.id)){draft.mails.allIds.push(mail.id);}});}case OPEN_SIDEBAR:{return produce(state,function(draft){draft.sidebarOpen=true;});}case CLOSE_SIDEBAR:{return produce(state,function(draft){draft.sidebarOpen=false;});}case OPEN_NEW_MESSAGE:{return produce(state,function(draft){draft.newMessageOpen=true;});}case CLOSE_NEW_MESSAGE:{return produce(state,function(draft){draft.newMessageOpen=false;});}default:{return state;}}};export default mailReducer;
